amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the Teacher Incentive Fund by $70 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for the Teacher Incentive Fund by $70,000,000. To offset the increase, the funds for AmeriCorps were reduced by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Price (GA) amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 102 - 298 (Roll no. 308).
